Testing FADD instruction

=== Test 1: FADD with register operands ===

Test case 1:
Operand A: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Operand B: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Result: 2.00000000000000000000 (0x40008000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 2:
Operand A: -1.00000000000000000000 (0xbfff8000000000000000)
Operand B: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Result: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 3:
Operand A: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Operand B: -0.00000000000000000000 (0x80000000000000000000)
Result: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 4:
Operand A: inf (0x7fff8000000000000000)

Tag Word:     0x0500
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 1, C3: 0
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 5:
Operand A: inf (0x7fff8000000000000000)
Operand B: -inf (0xffff8000000000000000)
Result: -nan (0xffffc000000000000000)

Tag Word:     0x0101
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE 
PASS

Test case 10:

Operand B: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)

Exceptions: IE 
PASS

Test case 11:
Operand A: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Operand B: -1.00000000000000009996 (0xbfff800000000000039a)
Result: -0.00000000000000009996 (0xbfc9e680000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0101
Tag Word:     0x0101
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE 
FAIL: Expected -0.00000000000000010000 (0xbfc9e69594bec44de15b)
       Got -0.00000000000000009996 (0xbfc9e680000000000000)

=== Test 2: FADD with memory operands ===

Test case 1:
Operand A: 0.50000000000000000000 (0x3ffe8000000000000000)
Operand B: 0.25000000000000000000 (0x3ffd8000000000000000)
Result: 0.75000000000000000000 (0x3ffec000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0101
Tag Word:     0x0101
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE 
PASS

Test case 2:
Operand A: 100000000000000000000.00000000000000000000 (0x4041ad78ebc5ac620000)
Operand B: 0.00000000000000000001 (0x3fbcbce5086492111aeb)
Result: 100000000000000000000.00000000000000000000 (0x4041ad78ebc5ac620000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0121
Tag Word:     0x0121
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE PE 
PASS

Test case 3:
Operand A: 0.00000000000000000001 (0x3fbcbce5086492111aeb)
Operand B: 100000000000000000000.00000000000000000000 (0x4041ad78ebc5ac620000)
Result: 100000000000000000000.00000000000000000000 (0x4041ad78ebc5ac620000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0121
Tag Word:     0x0121
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE PE 
PASS

Test case 4:

Operand B: 9.87654320999999999972 (0x40029e06522c47b19a6c)

Tag Word:     0x0121
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE PE 
PASS

Test case 5:
Operand A: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000001)

Exceptions: IE DE PE 
PASS

Test case 6:
Operand A: -0.00000000000000000000 (0x80000000000000000001)

Tag Word:     0x0123
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: IE DE PE 
PASS

FADD test completed
